text: Iron Fist (Daniel Thomas "Danny" Rand) is a fictional character appearing in American comic books published by Marvel Comics. It was created by Roy Thomas and Gil Kane. Iron Fist first appeared in Marvel Premiere #15. == In other media == Iron Fist has been adapted to appear in several animated television series and video games. Finn Jones portrayed the character in the live-action Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU) Netflix television series Iron Fist (2016â€“2018), The Defenders (2017), and the second season of Luke Cage. Category:Marvel Comics superheroes
title: Iron Fist (character)
